title: 1 br old world charming craftsman apartment
posting_body: this apartment has all the old world charm, all crown moldings, bay windows, in well maintained and solid construction.
Not the square box shaped construction with no character.
this is a garden apartment with a nice view of a well maintained garden.
hardwood floors, remodeled kitchen and bath.
nice low maintenance garden, laundry in building.
located 1 block from 2 major transit lines, delis, cafes, grocery, and many great take out restaurants.
Please be mature, responsible, with good credit.
this is a non smoking building
